attributes.comment:
Re: DHS Docket No. USCIS- 2006-0044

Increasing the fees to file can and will be a financial hardship for many people
hoping to expand their families through international adoption. With the wait times
increasing for many international adoption programs, it is now not inconceivable
that families will be forced to file not once, but twice and possibly three times
before their adoption is complete!

Please consider not increasing the fees associated with this process. It will mean
the difference between helping children have a family, and not.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By A. C. P
